mapper.select: select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode}

SELECT gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, cateCodeRef,cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate,gdsImg,gdsThumbImg from(select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_goods pk_goods)*/ rownum rn, g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode} and
rownum <=#{pageNum}*#{amount}) where rn >(#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (gdsNum, userId, repNum, repCon) values (#{gdsNum}, #{userId}, tbl_reply_seq.nextval, #{repCon})
mapper.select: select r.gdsNum, r.userId, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repDate, r.userid ,m.name as userName,m.mb from tbl_reply r inner join ark_newmember2 m on r.userId = m.id where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_goods set replycnt=replycnt+#{amount} where gdsNum=#{gdsNum}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartNum, userId, gdsNum, cartStock) values (tbl_cart_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.userId, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3,userAddr4, orderPhon, amount) values(#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3},#{userAddr4}, #{orderPhon}, #{amount})
insert into tbl_order_details(orderDetailsNum, orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select tbl_order_details_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from tbl_cart
mapper.select: select orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3,userAddr4, orderPhon, amount, orderDate,delivery from tbl_order where userId = #{userId}

select o.orderId, o.userId, o.orderRec, o.userAddr1, o.userAddr2, o.userAddr3,o.userAddr4, o.orderPhon, o.amount, o.orderDate, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice,o.delivery from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.userId = #{userId} and o.orderId = #{orderId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO liketo(likeno, boardno, mno, like_check) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(likeno), 0) + 1 as likeno FROM liketo), #{gdsNum}, #{userId}, 0)
